description: Devon contacted me a few weeks ago saying he was a big fan of my website. Though he is straight, he found the concept very cool.</br>He sent me a few pics, asking me if he could come to an audition. I answered: 'Hell no! You don't need to audition buddy, I'm booking you right away!'</br>It is quite rare you find this type of guy with huge muscles, a flat stomach and a gorgeous model face. In addition, he is very open-minded and willing to experiment with a mask on. So remember his name, Devon Dexx, 'cause you'll see more of him on Maskurbate.com
title: Devon Dexx
